Rice Pudding

üñ®Ô∏è PDF

Ingredients

  • 1 1‚ÅÑ2 cups cooked rice
  • 2 cups whole milk, divided
  • 1‚ÅÑ4 teaspoon salt
  • 2‚ÅÑ3 cup raisins
  • 1 egg, beaten
  • 1‚ÅÑ3 cup white sugar
  • 1 tablespoon butter
  • 1‚ÅÑ2 teaspoon vanilla extract

Instructions

  1. Simmer rice, 1 1‚ÅÑ2 cups milk, and salt until thick and creamy, 15 to 20 minutes.
  2. Add remaining 1‚ÅÑ2 cup milk, raisins, egg, and sugar. Continue cooking until thickened, 2 to 3 minutes.
  3. Remove from heat and stir in butter and vanilla.
  4. Serve with cinnamon and nutmeg.
